news.title: Fed Governor Waller says central bank could cut rates as early as July
news.summary: The central banker said he and his colleagues should move slowly but start to ease. He said inflation is now longer a major threat to the economy.

news.title: Europe and Iran to hold talks as Trump sets two-week deadline for U.S. strikes decision
news.summary: European officials are hoping for a last-minute diplomatic breakthrough with Tehran to deter further escalations of the Middle East conflict. European officials hope for a final breakthrough with Iran to deter future escalations.

news.title: Meta, EssilorLuxottica unveil Oakley smart glasses
news.summary: Oakley Meta HSTN are AI smart glasses pitched toward athletes with a starting price of $399. Meta and EssilorLuxottica debut the Oakley Meta.

news.title: In race to attract data centers, states forfeit hundreds of millions of dollars in tax revenue to tech companies
news.summary: Amazon, Meta and Google are among the beneficiaries of state tax exemptions for data centers that help power AI. Amazon, Meta, Google and other tech giants benefit from tax exemptions on data centers.

news.title: Darden Restaurants beats earnings estimates, as Olive Garden parent predicts growth in 2026
news.summary: Darden Restaurants beat Wall Street's earnings and revenue estimates. Olive Garden parent predicted solid growth for the fiscal year 2026. The company also expects solid growth in fiscal year 2020.

news.title: Stock picks and perspectives from a mutual fund approaching its hundredth anniversary
news.summary: The Investment Company of America fund has rolled with world war and evolving economies. These are its stock picks. Since launching in 1934, the fund has made a profit on every dollar invested.

news.title: CarMax sees strong used-car demand in the wake of tariffs. The stock is climbing.
news.summary: CarMax’s stock surges, as used-vehicle sales rise at the fastest rate in nearly four years. CarMax is the largest used car retailer in the U.S.

news.title: Why stablecoin play Circle’s stock is still a buy even after a sixfold rally
news.summary: An analyst projects revenue growth of up to 30% a year for Circle Internet. Circle Internet is expected to outpace other fintechs.

news.title: Home Depot continues its building-products expansion with reported bid for GMS
news.summary: Home Depot made a buyout bid for buildings-products distributor GMS, the WSJ reported. Home Depot bought SRS Distribution for over $18 billion.

news.title: Trump officials paused and then resumed immigration raids in key economic sectors. Industry leaders say they’re still hopeful they can make their case.
news.summary: One immigration expert says he doesn't expect any longer-term administration shift on raids. But he thinks maybe the pause had no real effect.
